agitate.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to argue strongly in public for something you want, especially a political or social change
agitate.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: His family are agitating to get him freed.
agitate.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to make someone feel anxious, upset, and nervous
agitate.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: I must warn you that any mention of Clare agitates your grandmother.
agitate.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to shake or mix a liquid quickly
